professional_summary: Experienced Oracle Database Administrator with expertise in RAC, Data Guard, RMAN, GoldenGate, and VM configurations. Skilled in database installation, configuration, patching, backup/recovery, replication, performance tuning, and capacity planning.

key_responsibilities: and administration of Oracle databases in production
Backup and recovery strategies using RMAN and DataGuard.
Configuration of high-availability and disaster recovery solutions using RAC and DataGuard.
Implementation of replication and data movement using GoldenGate.
